text: Curtis Fleming (born April 25, 1955) is an American rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States Category:Rowers at the 1983 Pan American Games
title: Curtis Fleming (rower)
